evidence.claim: VasoGnosis is compliant with HIPAA regulations.
Utilizes AWS cloud services for infrastructure management.
Integrates FHIR standards for health information exchange.
Engages with HL7 protocols for data interoperability in healthcare.
Supports EDI and X12 transaction sets for electronic health data exchange.

icp.icp_reason: No clear evidence of X12 or EDI transaction capability or use cases found.
